name: Hello My Name Is (Polyethyleneglykol)
description:
HELLO MY NAME IS: Made in 3 days for Mini Jam: 57

(Optional Theme: Underground)

(Limitation: One Room Only)

It would be highly appreciated if you could rate and leave feedback after playing. Controls Left & Right mouse to grab objects Q & E To Jerk your arms. Space to Stand up and Strengthen your muscles. F to say sorry. R - Restart level P - Quit Shown on: Any videos or sites about this game will be shown here. #Gameplay# QUEENFAITH2020 Patch Log: v1 # First Version v1.1 # Fixed - Low work performance warning not showing up. # Adjusted - Objective text size & scale to be read easier. # Added - Quit and restart buttons to the ESC Menu. # Added - Setting names for sliders. Licences: Music:
The Show Must Be Go by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4509-the-show-must-be-go
